items.title: How to Make Stress Your Friend | Kelly McGonigal | TED
items.description: A fascinating TED Talk about changing your mindset to make stress work for you instead of against you.

items.title: Stress Symptoms, Signs, and Causes
items.description: HelpGuide explains how stress affects your mind and body, and offers practical tips to manage it effectively.

items.title: How Stress Affects Your Body - Sharon Horesh Bergquist
items.description: An animated explanation of what happens inside your body when you’re stressed.

items.title: Stress Relievers: Tips to Tame Stress
items.description: Practical advice from Mayo Clinic on how to manage stress in healthy ways.

items.title: 5 Ways Chronic Stress Alters Your Brain and How to Safeguard Your Mental Well-being
items.description: Learn how chronic stress impacts brain function and what you can do to protect your mental health.

items.title: 10 Stress Busters
items.description: The NHS shares 10 simple and effective ways to reduce stress and improve your emotional wellbeing.

items.title: Tips and Strategies to Manage Anxiety and Stress
items.description: Practical strategies from the Anxiety and Depression Association of America (ADAA) to manage stress and anxiety in daily life.

items.title: What is Anxiety?
items.description: An animated explainer video that breaks down what anxiety is, how it manifests in the body, and why it’s a normal human emotion that can become overwhelming when unmanaged.

items.title: Tips for Coping with an Anxiety Disorder
items.description: Mayo Clinic News Network article offering guidance on lifestyle changes and relaxation techniques to manage anxiety effectively.

items.title: What’s Normal Anxiety – and What’s an Anxiety Disorder? | Body Stuff with Dr. Jen Gunter | TED
items.description: TED video by Dr. Jen Gunter that explores the difference between normal anxiety and anxiety disorders, helping viewers recognize when to seek help.

items.title: 31 Surprising Things That Reduce Anxiety Fast
items.description: A Dignity Health article sharing simple, science-based and unexpected ways to quickly reduce anxiety levels and calm your mind.

items.title: How to Stop Feeling Anxious About Anxiety | Tim Box | TEDxFolkestone
items.description: Tim Box explains how to break the feedback loop of fearing your own anxiety, helping you develop a healthier relationship with it.

items.title: "I'm Fine" - Learning To Live With Depression | Jake Tyler | TEDxBrighton
items.description: In this heartfelt talk, Jake Tyler shares his journey of living with depression and how he learned to navigate through it with honesty and resilience.

items.title: Clinical Depression: What Does That Mean?
items.description: An article from Mayo Clinic explaining what clinical depression is and how it differs from normal sadness.

items.title: Depression: Understanding Intense Moods and Getting Treatment | Stanford
items.description: Stanford experts explain what depression is, its symptoms, and how to seek effective treatments for recovery.

items.title: What to Do When You Love Someone with Depression
items.description: A NAMI blog post offering practical guidance on how to support loved ones living with depression while maintaining healthy boundaries.

items.title: Depression Explained (Major Depressive Disorder)
items.description: An animated video explaining the causes, symptoms, and treatment of major depressive disorder in a simple and educational way.

items.title: How to Support a Friend with Depression
items.description: Henry Ford Health provides insight on recognizing signs of depression and effective ways to support someone going through it.

items.title: Cultivating Unconditional Self-Worth | Adia Gooden | TEDxDePaulUniversity
items.description: In this inspiring TEDx talk, Adia Gooden explores how to break free from the need for external validation and build a sense of unconditional self-worth.

items.title: Build Your Self-Esteem with These 12 Proven Strategies
items.description: A comprehensive guide from BetterUp with science-backed strategies to strengthen your self-esteem and confidence at work and in life.

items.title: Your Self Esteem Was Destroyed In Childhood
items.description: A video that explains how early childhood experiences shape self-esteem and how to rebuild it as an adult through awareness and compassion.

items.title: How can I improve my self-esteem?
items.description: Mind UK offers practical, compassionate advice to build self-worth and manage self-critical thoughts in everyday life.

items.title: 3 tips to boost your confidence - TED-Ed
items.description: A short animated TED-Ed lesson that explores psychological techniques and behavioral changes to help you feel more confident in daily life.

items.title: Building Self-Esteem
items.description: HealthyPlace’s ongoing blog series explores self-acceptance, emotional healing, and strategies to overcome low self-esteem.

items.title: Relationships Are Hard, But Why? | Stan Tatkin | TEDxKC
items.description: Therapist Stan Tatkin explains why relationships can be so challenging and how to build secure and lasting bonds.

items.title: Growing a Healthy and Loving Relationship
items.description: Imago Relationships provides practical advice on how to reconnect, communicate better, and strengthen love over time.

items.title: The Science of Falling in Love | Shannon Odell
items.description: A fun and scientific look at what happens in your brain when you fall in love — chemistry, emotions, and neural connections.

items.title: Healthy Relationships in Practice
items.description: The Gottman Institute shares research-based tools to improve communication, trust, and intimacy in your relationship.

items.title: 4 Habits of ALL Successful Relationships | Dr. Andrea & Jonathan Taylor-Cummings | TEDxSquareMile
items.description: Discover four essential habits that strengthen every successful relationship, according to Dr. Andrea and Jonathan Taylor-Cummings.

items.title: What a Healthy Relationship Really Looks Like
items.description: Psychology Today explores what truly defines a healthy relationship: mutual respect, emotional safety, humor, and teamwork.

items.title: Positive Parenting Tips
items.description: Practical tips from the CDC on how to nurture healthy parent-child relationships and support positive child development at every stage.

items.title: How to Raise Successful Kids -- Without Over-Parenting | Julie Lythcott-Haims | TED
items.description: Julie Lythcott-Haims explores how over-parenting can harm children’s growth and shares how to raise confident, capable, and independent kids.

items.title: Why Parenting Styles Matter When Raising Children
items.description: An insightful article by Verywell Mind explaining different parenting styles, their characteristics, and how they impact a child's development and behavior.

items.title: Why Most Parenting Advice is Wrong | Yuko Munakata | TEDxCU
items.description: Yuko Munakata, a developmental psychologist, challenges common misconceptions about parenting and explains what truly shapes children’s outcomes.

items.title: Positive Parenting
items.description: An NIH article discussing the importance of positive parenting approaches and how they promote children’s mental and emotional well-being.

items.title: 5 Parenting Styles and Their Effects on Life
items.description: A concise explanation of the five main parenting styles and how each influences a child’s emotional and social development.

items.title: When Someone You Love Dies, There Is No Such Thing as Moving On | Kelley Lynn | TEDxAdelphiUniversity
items.description: A heartfelt TEDx talk by Kelley Lynn explaining why grief is not something to 'move on' from, but rather something to live with and grow through.

items.title: Bereavement and Grief | Mental Health America
items.description: An informative guide from Mental Health America that explains what grief is, common emotional reactions, and how to manage them in a healthy way.

items.title: Grief: What Everyone Should Know | Tanya Villanueva Tepper | TEDxUMiami
items.description: Tanya Villanueva Tepper shares a powerful perspective on grief, loss, and resilience based on her personal experience after the events of 9/11.

items.title: What’s Your Grief — Understanding Loss Beyond the Stages
items.description: A comprehensive blog exploring grief beyond the traditional five stages, offering personal stories, coping tools, and emotional support resources.

items.title: How Grief Affects Your Brain And What To Do About It | Better | NBC News
items.description: A science-based video explaining how grief impacts the brain and offering practical advice to help the healing process.

items.title: Coping With Grief: 7 Things to Remember When Dealing With Loss | Memorial Sloan Kettering
items.description: An article by Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center offering seven key reminders for navigating grief and finding meaning after loss.

items.title: Occupational Burnout: When Work Becomes Overwhelming
items.description: A detailed explanation of occupational burnout, its symptoms, and how chronic stress in the workplace can lead to emotional exhaustion.

items.title: How to Recognize Employee Burnout
items.description: WorkRamp's article that helps managers and HR professionals identify the signs of employee burnout and offers actionable steps to support recovery.

items.title: Burnout and Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder | Dr. Geri Puleo | TEDxSetonHillUniversity
items.description: Dr. Geri Puleo explores the connection between burnout and post-traumatic stress, offering insights on how to recognize and recover from chronic work-related stress.

items.title: Workplace Burnout: Building Awareness and Prevention
items.description: Article by the Anxiety and Depression Association of America (ADAA) explaining how to recognize workplace burnout, build awareness, and prevent emotional exhaustion.

items.title: 6 Signs You’re Burnt Out, Not Lazy
items.description: This video breaks down the difference between laziness and burnout, highlighting six clear signs that your exhaustion may be due to chronic stress rather than lack of motivation.

items.title: Job Burnout: How to Spot It and Take Action
items.description: Mayo Clinic's comprehensive guide to identifying job burnout, understanding its physical and emotional effects, and learning practical ways to regain balance and well-being.
